## ObserverEventState.(constructor)

Create a new EventState

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(mask: number, skipNextObservers?: boolean, target?: any, currentTarget?: any);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  mask | <code>number</code> | defines the mask associated with this state |
|  skipNextObservers | <code>boolean</code> | defines a flag which will instruct the observable to skip following observers when set to true |
|  target | <code>any</code> | defines the original target of the state |
|  currentTarget | <code>any</code> | defines the current target of the state |
